import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Tabs, Tab } from 'react-bootstrap' import Spinner from './Spinner' import { loadBalances, depositEther, withdrawEther } from '../store/interactions' import { web3Selector, exchangeSelector, tokenSelector, accountSelector, etherBalanceSelector, tokenBalanceSelector, exchangeTokenBalanceSelector, exchangeEtherBalanceSelector, balancesLoadingSelector, etherDepositAmountSelector, etherWithdrawAmountSelector } from '../store/selectors' import { etherDepositAmountChanged, etherWithdrawAmountChanged } from '../store/actions' const showForm =(props) => { const { etherBalance, tokenBalance, exchangeEtherBalance, exchangeTokenBalance, dispatch, etherDepositAmount, exchange, token, account, web3, etherWithdrawAmount } = props // See Redux Forms for further form customization return(
Token Wallet Exchange
ETH {etherBalance} {exchangeEtherBalance}
DAPP {tokenBalance} {exchangeTokenBalance}
{ event.preventDefault() depositEther(dispatch, exchange, web3, etherDepositAmount, account) console.log("form submitting...") }}>
dispatch( etherDepositAmountChanged(e.target.value)) } className="form-control form-control-sm bg-dark text-white" required />
Token Wallet Exchange
ETH {etherBalance} {exchangeEtherBalance}
{ event.preventDefault() withdrawEther(dispatch, exchange, web3, etherWithdrawAmount, account) }}>
dispatch( etherWithdrawAmountChanged(e.target.value) ) } className="form-control form-control-sm bg-dark text-white" required />
DAPP {tokenBalance} {exchangeTokenBalance}
) } class Balance extends Component { componentWillMount() { this.loadBlockchainData() } async loadBlockchainData() { const { dispatch, web3, exchange, token, account } = this.props await loadBalances(dispatch, web3, exchange, token, account) // Ether balance comes from web3 } render() { return (
Balance
{this.props.showForm ? showForm(this.props) : }
) } } function mapStateToProps(state) { const balancesLoading = balancesLoadingSelector(state) console.log({ account: accountSelector(state), exchange: exchangeSelector(state), token: tokenSelector(state), web3: web3Selector(state), etherBalance: etherBalanceSelector(state), tokenBalance: tokenBalanceSelector(state), exchangeEtherBalance: exchangeEtherBalanceSelector(state), exchangeTokenBalance: exchangeTokenBalanceSelector(state), balancesLoading: balancesLoadingSelector(state), }) return { account: accountSelector(state), exchange: exchangeSelector(state), token: tokenSelector(state), web3: web3Selector(state), etherBalance: etherBalanceSelector(state), tokenBalance: tokenBalanceSelector(state), exchangeEtherBalance: exchangeEtherBalanceSelector(state), exchangeTokenBalance: exchangeTokenBalanceSelector(state), // balancesLoading: balancesLoadingSelector(state), balancesLoading, showForm: !balancesLoading, etherDepositAmount: etherDepositAmountSelector(state), etherWithdrawAmount: etherWithdrawAmountSelector(state) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Balance)
